analyzed: o swa sti

original: dag pa gnyis ldan chos sku kun tu bzang //

analyzed: lhun grub nges ba lnga rdzogs longs sku sprin

analyzed: gang dul der snang ma gag sprul ba sku

original: sku gsum dbyer med bla med mchog gis skyongs //
analyzed: sku gsum dbyer med bla med mchog gis skyongs

analyzed: gzhi brgyud dbang bzhis smin ba byang chub sems

analyzed: brgyud sde bye ba yang bcud di kho na

analyzed: snang srid ye sangs rgya ba lta bu lung

analyzed: dag mnyam bden ba dbyer med grub ba mtha rnon rig dzin rnam bzhi rgyal thabs la

analyzed: mig phrul bzhin du bgrod byed di min su

analyzed: tan+t+ra zab gnad rig dzin rgyal po yi

analyzed: grub mchog yongs kyi gshegs shul zla med bul

analyzed: snga gyur brgyud ba khyad nor mtshungs bral yin

analyzed: gzhan zer brag ca lad mo mi mdzad ba

analyzed: gcig las du mar char ba spor gyi phrul

analyzed: ston gnyis dar rgya gling gi chos grwar spel

analyzed: dge ba gro kun gdod gzhir ngal tsho shog la rig dzin brgyud ba sprin chen khrig
